item.description:
New Hampshire Old House & Barn Exposition

Presented by the New Hampshire Preservation Alliance

 

Saturday, March 24 & Sunday, March 25, 2012

9:00 a.m. - 5:00 p.m. at the Center of NH Radisson Hotel

$10 adults, $7 students & seniors, children under 12 FREE

For further information call (603)224-2281 or e-mail admin@nhpreservation.org.

 The Manchester Historic Association is proud to be an Organizational Partner of this event.

Old is the “new” hot thing, according to the New Hampshire Preservation Alliance. Care for old homes and the desire for traditional designs are part of “green” and “go local” trends that prove to be good investments. That’s the theme of the 2012 New Hampshire Old House and Barn Expo. This year’s Expo offers more than 100 exhibitors, lectures and demonstrations. Expo attendees can enjoy topics ranging from new technologies in old houses and energy savings to bat management, historic paint colors, barn repair, moisture management, and how to research the history of your house. This event is thoroughly enjoyable for anyone who loves history, old buildings, and traditional crafts.
item.name: New Hampshire Old House & Barn Exposition
